languages.text: "Да я лучше один раз сгорю заживо, чем буду всю оставшуюся жизнь горбатиться на сменах, а потом меня еще изобьют и пайковые талоны отожмут!"
"I'd rather burn alive once than spend the rest of my life breaking my back, shift after shift, for a few measly ration cards they'll just take from me anyway. And then beat me up for good measure!"
languages.original_text: "Да я лучше один раз сгорю заживо, чем буду всю оставшуюся жизнь горбатиться на сменах, а потом меня еще изобьют и пайковые талоны отожмут!"

traits.locale_text: "I'd rather burn alive once than spend the rest of my life breaking my back, shift after shift, for a few ration cards they'll take from me anyway and beat me up for good measure!"
"I'd rather burn alive once than spend the rest of my life breaking my back, shift after shift, for a few ration cards they'll take from me anyway and beat me up for good measure!"
"I'd rather burn alive once than spend the rest of my life breaking my back, shift after shift, for a few measly ration cards they'll just take from me anyway. And then beat me up for good measure!"
"I'd rather burn alive once than spend the rest of my life breaking my back, shift after shift, for a few measly ration cards they'll just take from me anyway. And then beat me up for good measure!"
"I'd rather burn alive once than spend the rest of my life breaking my back, shift after shift, for a few measly ration cards they'll just take from me anyway. And then beat me up for good measure!"
"I'd rather burn alive once than spend the rest of my life breaking my back, shift after shift, for a few measly ration cards they'll just take from me anyway. And then beat me up for good measure!"

languages.text: «Prefiero morir calcinado de una vez que pasarme el resto de la vida deslomándome guardia tras guardia por unas tristes tarjetas de racionamiento que van a quitarme igualmente. ¡Y para que me den una paliza de regalo!».
languages.original_text: "I'd rather burn alive once than spend the rest of my life breaking my back, shift after shift, for a few measly ration cards they'll just take from me anyway. And then beat me up for good measure!"

traits.locale_text: «Prefiero morir calcinado de una vez que pasarme el resto de la vida deslomándome guardia tras guardia por unas tristes tarjetas de racionamiento que van a quitarme igualmente. ¡Y para que me den una paliza de regalo!».

languages.text: 「すぐに奪われる配給カードのために、シフトに次ぐシフトの繰り返しで、腰を痛めながら残りの人生を過ごすくらいなら、それに好き勝手に殴りつけられるぐらいなら、一度生きたまま焼かれる方がましだね！」
languages.original_text: "I'd rather burn alive once than spend the rest of my life breaking my back, shift after shift, for a few measly ration cards they'll just take from me anyway. And then beat me up for good measure!"

traits.locale_text: 「すぐに奪われる配給カードのために、シフトに次ぐシフトの繰り返しで、腰を痛めながら残りの人生を過ごすくらいなら、それに好き勝手に殴りつけられるぐらいなら、一度生きたまま焼かれる方がましだね！」

languages.text: “我宁可被活活烧死，也不想没日没夜地干活，累死累活干上一辈子，好不容易赚到几张微不足道的配给卡，还要被那些人抢走！他们还揍了我一顿！”
languages.original_text: "I'd rather burn alive once than spend the rest of my life breaking my back, shift after shift, for a few measly ration cards they'll just take from me anyway. And then beat me up for good measure!"

traits.locale_text: “我宁可被活活烧死，也不想没日没夜地干活，累死累活干上一辈子，好不容易赚到几张微不足道的配给卡，还要被那些人抢走！他们还揍了我一顿！”

languages.text: "Lieber verbrenne ich einmal bei lebendigem Leib, als mir den Rest meines Lebens das Kreuz zu brechen, Schicht um Schicht, für ein paar mickrige Essensmarken, die sie mir ohnehin wieder wegnehmen. Und danach verprügeln sie mich auch noch, einfach so!"
languages.original_text: "I'd rather burn alive once than spend the rest of my life breaking my back, shift after shift, for a few measly ration cards they'll just take from me anyway. And then beat me up for good measure!"

traits.locale_text: "Lieber verbrenne ich einmal bei lebendigem Leib, als mir den Rest meines Lebens das Kreuz zu brechen, Schicht um Schicht, für ein paar mickrige Essensmarken, die sie mir ohnehin wieder wegnehmen. Und danach verprügeln sie mich auch noch, einfach so!"

languages.text: « Je préfère brûler vif que de passer le reste de ma vie à trimer pour quelques tickets de rationnement qu'ils finiront de toute façon par me prendre. Après m'avoir tabassé, histoire de pas faire les choses à moitié ! »
languages.original_text: "I'd rather burn alive once than spend the rest of my life breaking my back, shift after shift, for a few measly ration cards they'll just take from me anyway. And then beat me up for good measure!"

traits.locale_text: « Je préfère brûler vif que de passer le reste de ma vie à trimer pour quelques tickets de rationnement qu'ils finiront de toute façon par me prendre. Après m'avoir tabassé, histoire de pas faire les choses à moitié ! »

languages.text: "Birkaç tane değersiz kumanya kartı alayım diye ömrümün sonuna kadar her vardiyada eşek gibi çalışacağıma bir kerede diri diri yanmayı tercih ederim. Nasılsa kartları elimden alacaklar. Sonra da beni bir güzel dövecekler!"
languages.original_text: "I'd rather burn alive once than spend the rest of my life breaking my back, shift after shift, for a few measly ration cards they'll just take from me anyway. And then beat me up for good measure!"
